scripts.e:dev: yarn build && cp -r electron/. dist && cd dist && yarn && yarn dev
scripts.e:build: yarn build && cp -r electron/. dist && cd dist && yarn && yarn build
scripts.ne:dev: npm run build && cp -r electron/. dist && cd dist && npm run && npm run dev
scripts.ne:build: npm run build && cp -r electron/. dist && cd dist && npm run && npm run build
